views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 9 and 10 on all devices
Requires Hue brand lighting.

Ambiance is the perfect link between iOS and your Hue Lights. It has never been so easy to control them!

2 different modes are available:

- Music Mode: The color of your lights will be updated depending on the album art of the currently playing song
- Screen Mode: The color of your lights will be updated depending on what's on the screen

A on/off Activator action is also included

Configure options from the settings app
